org.icepdf.core.pobjects.acroform.signature

Class AbstractPkcsValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icepdf.core.pobjects.acroform.signature.AbstractPkcsValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignatureValidator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pkcs1Validator, Pkcs7Validator

    public abstract class AbstractPkcsValidator
extends Object
implements SignatureValidator
    PKCS#1 and PKCS#7 are fairly close from a verification point of view so we'll use this class for common functionality between PKCS#1 and PKCS#7.

        protected void parseSignerData(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Sequence signedData,

        DigestAlgorithmIdentifiers ::= SET OF DigestAlgorithmIdentifier SignerInfos ::= SET OF SignerInfo
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • captureSignedData

        protected org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Sequence captureSignedData(byte[] cmsData)
                                                        throws SignatureIntegrityException
        The CMS associates a content type identifier with a content. The syntax MUST have ASN.1 type ContentInfo: ContentInfo ::= SEQUENCE { contentType ContentType, content [0] EXPLICIT ANY DEFINED BY contentType } ContentType ::= OBJECT IDENTIFIER
        Parameters:
        cmsData - cms data to parse.
        Returns:
        ASN1Sequence
        Throws:
        SignatureIntegrityException - error parsing certificate dat.

      • buildASN1Primitive

        protected org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Sequence buildASN1Primitive(byte[] cmsData)
        Takes the DER-encoded PKCS#1 binary data or PKCS#7 binary data object and reads it into an Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASNI.1) object.
        Parameters:
        cmsData - certificate data to parse.
        Returns:
        ASN1Sequence representing the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS), null if data stream could not be loaded

      • isSignedDataModified

        public boolean isSignedDataModified()
        Indicates if the singed data section specified by a signature has been modified. This indicates the document has been tampered with.
        Specified by:
        isSignedDataModified in interface SignatureValidator
        Returns:
        true if singed data has been altered, false otherwise.

      • isDocumentDataModified

        public boolean isDocumentDataModified()
        Indicates that data after the signature definition has been been modified. This is most likely do to another signature being added to the document or some form or page manipulation. However it is possible that an major update has been appended to the document.
        Specified by:
        isDocumentDataModified in interface SignatureValidator
        Returns:
        true if the document has been modified outside the byte range of the signature.

      • isSignaturesCoverDocumentLength

        public boolean isSignaturesCoverDocumentLength()
        Description copied from interface: SignatureValidator
        Indicates that there are no unaccounted for bytes in the file that haven't been singed. This generally indicates if true that the document is unmodified as the signatures cover all teh bytes in the file.
        Specified by:
        isSignaturesCoverDocumentLength in interface SignatureValidator
        Returns:
        true if signatures cover length of file.

      • setSignaturesCoverDocumentLength

        Description copied from interface: SignatureValidator
        Sets the signaturesCoverDocumentLength param to indicate that all signatures have been check and cover all the bytes in the document.
        Specified by:
        setSignaturesCoverDocumentLength in interface SignatureValidator
        Parameters:
        signaturesCoverDocumentLength - true if signatures covers document length.
